title: Igor Tudor is no longer Juventus' head coach - Juventus
snippet: Juventus Football Club announces that it has today relieved Igor Tudor of his duties as head coach of the Men's First Team, along with his staff consisting of Ivan Javorcic, Tomislav Rogic and Riccardo Ragnacci.

title: Juventus sack manager Thiago Motta and bring in Igor Tudor as replacement | Juventus | The Guardian
snippet: Tudor, 46, is a former Juve player and Croatia international who most recently was in charge of Lazio. In 2020, Tudor was Andrea Pirlos assistant at Juventus for one season.

title: Breaking: Juventus Announce New Manager Until 2026 After Sacking Igor Tudor
snippet: After sacking Igor Tudor last Monday, Juventus had Massimo Brambilla serving as interim coach during today's match against Udinese, where they won 3-1.
